model_answer: The correct chronological order of the moments is: (1) The host welcomes viewers over upbeat electronic music, introducing that he’ll break down radio frequency science. (2) An on-screen comment from “J.L.” appears as the host announces “comment of the week”. (3) He explains thermolysis in the dermis and hypodermis and says, “collagen … is the gold.” (4) Visuals show a device and diagrams; bold pink text reads “YES!! RF CAN DESTROY FACIAL Fat CELLS” as he confirms RF can destroy fat. (5) The host signs off with “See ya” during the TJ Tutorials logo outro sequence. Therefore, the answer is A: 2 -> 1 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5.

The correct chronological order is: 
1. He thanks nearly 1,000 subscribers and clarifies he’s not a medical professional. (0.00 - 0.87)
2. He uses a balloon analogy to explain facial aging and volume loss. (0.90 - 4.28)
3. “SUBSCRIBE” appears in bold red as he says, “not all facial fat is a good thing.” (4.22 - 4.76)
4. He asks, “But how exactly does radio frequency heat the skin?” before explaining heating of the lower layers. (4.82 - 5.83)
5. He lists side effects such as swelling, burns, hyperpigmentation, scarring, headaches, and warns overuse can cause facial fat loss. (5.89 - 10.00)
6. He shares that he had only targeted fat loss and no adverse reactions; upbeat string music follows. (10.00 - 10.00)

Therefore, the answer is A: 1 -> 3 -> 2 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6.
